dashboard.name: [SL] Payment Term Analysis - Use case 1 - SOL-2617

blocks.text: If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.
This dashboard provides an overview and details on the payment terms.

Structure of the Dashboard
  Page 1 - Overview: Leading KPIs, a Process Discovery Widget and a Business Case Calculator 
  Page 2 - Impact: Overview of all payment terms in the current data set and their impact on your Invoice-to-Pay process
  Page 3 - Take Action: A collection of ideas to tackle the drivers of inefficiencies
  Page 4 - Case Details: An exportable list of single invoices and their most important attributes that can be filtered.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

children.name: Invoices with immediate PT
children.description: Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1 is null or 0

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: % of invoices with immediate PT
children.description: Number of invoice with immediate PT / total number of invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 

COUNT(case_id) FILTER ( WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0)
/COUNT(case_id) * 100

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: $ of Invoices with Immediate PT
children.description: Amount (USD) of invoice with immediate PT / total number of invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Immediate WC Impact
children.description: $ which could have saved if followed PO cash discount days on immediate PT invoice. Default interest rate set at 4%

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM(("Inv. Converted USD Amount")*("Last PO Cash Discount Days 1")*0.04/365) AS "$ of WC impact"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE ("Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0

blocks.text: Definition:
- "Last inv. item cash discount days 1" = 0 or NULL : Immediate Payment Term is when Payable are immediately due.
- "Last PO cash discount days 1" != 0 AND "Last inv. item cash discount days 1" = 0 : Invoices with immediate Payment Term but not on PO

children.name: Invoices with immediate PT
children.description: Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1 is null or 0

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 

COUNT(case_id) FILTER ( WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0)
/COUNT(case_id) * 100

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Immediate PT invoices by Company Code
children.description: Filter out when company code is NULL

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")FILTER 
(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) AS "Invoice Amount in $",
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER 
(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) AS "No. of invoices with immediate payment terms",
"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
--WHERE "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: Number of Immediate Invoices over time
children.description: % of invoices with immediate PT out of all invoices posted

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME)FILTER(
		WHERE event_name IN ('Post Invoice')) AS "Month")) AS "Invoice posting date", 
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL 
OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0)/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Rate (%) of Invoices with immediate payment terms"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Number of Invoices without PO
children.description: Event not follow the step of "Create Purchase Order" then "Post Invoice"

children.name: Number of invoices with immediate PT but not on PO

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) -- FILTER(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Number of Invoices"  
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 
--THEN 'Immediate PT on Invoice but not on PO'

blocks.text: At below Table, in column "Immediate PT behaviour", the Payment Term of each Vendor it is defined by 5 categories to see if any mis-match behaviour on immediate Payment Term listed differently on PO, Invoice, Vendor Master data.  Ands its respective count of invoices and amount is calculated:
- 'Immediate PT on PO': WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
- 'Immediate PT on Invoice but not on PO' : WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
- 'Immediate PT in Master Data' : WHEN "Last PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
- 'Immediate PT on PO but not on Invoice' : WHEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0
- 'ok': All the others

children.name: Payment term between PO and Invoice per PO Vendor Name

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" 
,CASE 
	WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on PO'
    WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on Invoice but not on PO'
    WHEN "Last PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT in Master Data'
    WHEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on PO but not on Invoice'
 ELSE 'ok'
 END AS "Immediate PT behavior"
,COUNT(case_id) -- FILTER(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Number of Invoices"  
,SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") -- FILTER(WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0)
AS "Invoice Amounts" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 3 desc

children.name: Different Payment terms per Invoice Vendor Name

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name",
count(case_id)
-- Invoice condition
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"

--PO condition
--,"PO Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last PO Cash Discount Days 1"
,"Last PO Cash Discount Days 2"
--,"PO Net Payment Days"
,"Last PO Net Payment Days"

-- Inv vendor master data condition
, "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1"
, "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2"
, "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master NDD"

-- Metric: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" END)) 
    AS "Payment Terms better on PO"

-- Metric: 
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
    AS "Immediate Payment Terms"    

FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 desc

children.name: Invoices With Shorter Payment Terms Than Defined in Vendor Master Data

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1" END)
    OR ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2" END))) AS "# of Invoices", 
    "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1",
    "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 1",
    "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2",
    "Last Inv. Item Vendor Master CD 2"
   
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
ORDER BY 5 desc

children.name: No. of Invoices with Multiple Payment Term Change Events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(CASE_ID)
FROM
(
 SELECT
  COUNT(CASE_ID) AS "CASE_COUNT", CASE_ID, EVENT_NAME
 FROM FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
 WHERE
  ("Changed Table" IN ('EKKO','BSEG'))
  AND ("Changed Field" IN  ('ZTERM', 'ZTERM', 'ZBD1T','ZBD2T','ZBD3T', 'ZBD1P', 'ZBD2P'))
 GROUP BY 2,3
) AS SUB1
WHERE "CASE_COUNT" > 1

blocks.text: 1. Attach a number to your Business Case to visualize its impact. You can start by using the below Business Case Calculator

children.name: Suggestions to reduce/avoid late payments include:

blocks.text: Reduce long cycle times by:
Automating Invoice Creation
Automating Invoice Clearing
Review approval times
Reduce Rework. Avoid Looping
Reduce Manual Entries
Master data should be managed well
Check which vendors could improve on and examine what good vendors are doing

children.name: Business Case Calculator
children.description: * FTE Cost / Min = ($70,000 ÷  261 days/year ÷ 8 hours/ day ÷  60 min/hr) = $0.56

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last PO Vendor Name",
count(case_id) AS "No. Invoices"
,CASE 
	WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on PO'
    WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on Invoice but not on PO'
    WHEN "Last PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT in Master Data'
    WHEN "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" != 0 AND "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" = 0 THEN 'Immediate PT on PO but not on Invoice'
 ELSE 'ok'
 END AS "Immediate PT behavior"
--,"PO Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last PO Cash Discount Days 1"

--,"PO Net Payment Days"
--, "Last PO Net Payment Days"
--,"PO Vendor Master Net Payment Days"

--,"Last FI Invoice Item Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"
--,"Last FI Invoice Item Net Payment Days"

--,"PO Vendor Master Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1"

, "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"

, "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
-- Metric: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" END)) 
    AS "Payment Terms better on PO"

-- Metric: 
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
    AS "Immediate Payment Terms"    

FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC

blocks.text: 1. Invoice with immediate payment terms (0 days net)
3. Comparison PO PT vs FI PT - combine into "impact". only get the final result

dataSource.query:
SELECT "Inv. Accounting Document Number", "Inv. Company Code Text", 
"Inv. Converted USD Amount", "Inv. Document Type Text", 
"Inv. Reference Transaction", "Last Doc Posting Date in Payment Table", 
"Last Inv. Item Baseline Date", "Last Inv. Item Debit/Credit Indicator Text", 
"Last Inv. Item Due Date", "Last Inv. Item Fixed Payment Terms", 
"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period", "Last Inv. Item Payment Method",
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key", "Last Payment Clearing Date", 
"Last Payment Date", "Last Payment Due Date of Paid Items", 
"Last Payment Method in Payment Table", "Last PO Company Name", 
"Last PO Net Payment Days", "Last PO Terms of Payment Key", 
"Last PO Vendor Master Net Payment Days", "Last PO Vendor Master Terms of Payment Key", 
"Last PO Vendor Name", "Payment Client", "Invoice Due Date", 
"Change Old Value", "Change New Value"     
FROM THIS_PROCESS
LIMIT 20

children.name: Number of invoices with "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" column is NULL

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id), "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" IS NULL

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id AS "Case ID", (SELECT COUNT ("EVENT_NAME")) AS "Event count", (SELECT LAST ("end_time") - FIRST ("end_time")) AS "Cycle time", (SELECT FIRST (end_time)) AS "Case start", (SELECT LAST (end_time)) AS "Case end", "Inv. Accounting Document Date"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT DISTINCT event_name AS "Event Name:", COUNT(case_id)
FROM FLATTEN (THIS_PROCESS)
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT case_id, "Inv. Accounting Document Date", 
"Inv. Accounting Document Number", 
"Inv. Cash Discount Amount in Document Currency", "Inv. Client", 
"Inv. Company Code" , "Inv. Company Code Text", "Inv. Date", 
"Inv. Document Type Text", "Invoice Due Date", "Invoice Line Item", 
"Last Doc Posting Date in Payment Table", 
"Last Inv. Item Baseline Date", 
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1", 
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2", 
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Due Date",

"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2",

"Last Inv. Item Customer Number",

"Last Inv. Item Delivery Schedule Line Number",
"Last Inv. Item Document Number of the Clearing Document",
"Last Inv. Item Due Date"
--"Last Inv. Item Baseline Date for Due Date"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
LIMIT 5

SELECT case_id,
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key", 
"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period", 
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2",
"Last PO Net Payment Days"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE 
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" = ('0001') OR "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" IS NULL

children.name: Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1 to filter immediate PT

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id,
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key", 
"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period", 
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2",
"Last PO Net Payment Days"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0

children.name: Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1 to filter immediate PT

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DISTINCT("Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key")
FROM THIS_PROCESS
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0

children.name: # Events: Update Payment Terms (Invoice) grouped by Inv. Supplier Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) / 1000, "Last PO Vendor Name"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE NOT EVENT_NAME IN ('Change Invoice Due Date', 'Change Baseline Date') 
-- AND (("Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" <> "Inv. Supplier Standard Payment Term" 
-- AND "PO ID" IS NULL) OR ("Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key" <> "PO Terms of Payment Key" 
-- AND "PO ID" IS NOT NULL))

children.name: Number of Invoices without PO
children.description: Event not follow the step of "Create Purchase Order" then "Post Invoice"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
    count(event_name) / 1000
FROM
    FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
    event_name IN ('Update PO Payment Terms')

children.name: Event: Update Payment Terms (Invoice)
children.description: EVENT_NAME = Change Invoice Due Date / Change Baseline Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
    count(event_name) / 1000
FROM
    FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
    event_name IN ('Change Invoice Due Date', 'Change Baseline Date')

SELECT case_id, 
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key", 
"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period", 
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1",
"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2",
"Last PO Net Payment Days"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period") 
		<> (CASE WHEN "Last PO Net Payment Days" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "Last PO Net Payment Days" END)

SELECT case_id, 
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key",
"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period", 
"Last PO Net Payment Days",
("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" - "Last PO Net Payment Days")AS "Inv-PO"
	
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" IS NOT NULL 
AND "Last PO Net Payment Days" IS NOT NULL 
-- AND ("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" <> "Last PO Net Payment Days")

children.name: Payment term distribution by company code text

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "Cases", 
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key", 
"Inv. Company Code Text"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT case_id, 
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key",
"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period", 
"Last PO Net Payment Days",
"Last PO Cash Discount Days 1",
("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" - "Last PO Net Payment Days")AS "Inv-PO"
	
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT case_id, 
"Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key",
"Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period", 
"Last PO Net Payment Days",
"Last PO Cash Discount Days 1",
("Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period" - "Last PO Net Payment Days")AS "Inv-PO"
	
FROM THIS_PROCESS

parameter.name: Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
count(case_id)
--,"PO Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last PO Cash Discount Days 1"

--,"PO Net Payment Days"
--, "Last PO Net Payment Days"
--,"PO Vendor Master Net Payment Days"

--,"Last FI Invoice Item Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"
--,"Last FI Invoice Item Net Payment Days"

--,"PO Vendor Master Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1"

, "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"

, "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
-- Metric: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" END)) 
    AS "Payment Terms better on PO"

-- Metric: 
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
    AS "Immediate Payment Terms"    

FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 desc

SELECT 
count(case_id)
--,"PO Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last PO Cash Discount Days 1"

--,"PO Net Payment Days"
--, "Last PO Net Payment Days"
--,"PO Vendor Master Net Payment Days"

--,"Last FI Invoice Item Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1"
--,"Last FI Invoice Item Net Payment Days"

--,"PO Vendor Master Terms of Payment Key"
,"Last PO Vendor Master Cash Discount Days 1"

, "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"

, "Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key"
-- Metric: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "Last PO Cash Discount Days 1" END)) 
    AS "Payment Terms better on PO"

-- Metric: 
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL
		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" = 0) 
    AS "Immediate Payment Terms"    

FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 desc
